mapper.insert: insert into review (info_id, review_info, review_score, accom_num, review_write) values (#{info_id}, #{review_info}, #{review_score}, #{accom_num}, now())
mapper.select: select * from review where accom_num=#{accom_num} order by review_num desc
select count(*) from review where accom_num=#{accom_num}
select * from review where accom_num=#{accom_num} order by accom_num desc limit #{start}, #{perpage}
